Detailed Description

Reads a .dot file and outputs the same file in .dre format (for use with the dreadnaught isomorphism testing program).

int main (  int  argc,

) 
 

initial ordering (none, bfs, or GBFS)

Whether to use the "true" median

iterative improvement (none, med/bary, adapt. ins., adapt. ins. + barycenter

whether to use a stable sort for median/barycenter (unstable may give better results)

whether to iterate only until there is no improvement (alternative is to keep iterating until there is no change at all); waiting until there is no change at all is more efficient because there is no need to perform the costly crossing number calculation after each iteration.
